headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JONAS, ALAN B.

snippet: JONAS--Alan B.,84, of Boca Raton, Florida passed away on February 25, 2016. Alan was predeceased by his loving wife Barbara. He was the devoted father of Daniel Jonas and Lori Jonas, father-in-law of Mimi Hoang and Robert Kruger and grandfather of Ilene and Julia Kruger. Born in New York City, Alan graduated from The Horace Mann School and Lafayette College. 1/3
